website_summaries.verdict: The best budget set of timbales with a better sound and feel when playing.
pros: Drum heads are durable without sacrificing the authentic timbale sound
Stand is adjustable in height and position to place the drums in the best spot for playing
Includes drum sticks and tuning key
cons: The drums may require some initial tuning to get the right sound and pitch from each one

customer_reviews.title: Great timbales
customer_reviews.text: These are great timbales for being under 100 dollars. I love the cowbell too, and I added my own wood block.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Kratzer

customer_reviews.title: I love this Timales
customer_reviews.text: I love this Timales. Great for beginners. I gave a four cause the heads wire was cracked in both head drums. Ibreturned it and got another within two days. I love Amazon's return and replacement policy. The welding on the heads wired could be better. But what can you expect, they are not LPs. But they are great for beginners and they are easy to tune and sound great. I recommend it but I will not but again.
customer_reviews.author: Maximino Laboy

customer_reviews.title: These things are sooo much fun. They're lout but who cares
customer_reviews.text: These things are sooo much fun. They're lout but who cares? Drums are supposed to be loud. Take the time to tune them how you like then go crazy! My wife and I like to play these with our cajon or some bongos.
customer_reviews.author: shadycrzy

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!!👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to retake a better picture of these timbales. I was skeptical on ordering these by looking at the picture posted. I'm glad I did because the quality of the timbales are far better thañ what the picture shows. Very impressed when I received them and played them. Great sound and quality for being an entry level timbal.
customer_reviews.author: Jose O.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice resonance and sound. Stand is a little rickety. Used them to gig and hauled them all over southern cal for rehearsals and they’ve stood up to the punishment.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Great little drum set for the price. Tunes nicely and both drums have a good tone. The cowbell isn't so great but does have a decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: M D McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the $! I think it compares to the LP timbales that are three times more. Buy this steal, and upgrade the heads. I even like the cow bell.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hoping to be a great player, Let the playing begin.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: This instrument is not what I had expected, but it is good for practicing on. Not very different in the sounds of the two drums.
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy stand, great sounding set, Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price! Bought for my son for Christmas... Came with a dent in the side, but it wasn't a huge deal, and we didn't have time to go through the bother of returning it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: ... the price I didn't expect them to sound this good. thanks
customer_reviews.text: for the price I didn't expect them to sound this good. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect, I was also looking for Timbale drum sticks ...
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect, I was also looking for Timbale drum sticks made of aluminum do you know where I can buy some Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: manuel jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Timbales
customer_reviews.text: Really good sounding drums great price came with all the equipment as promised now all I need are some cymbals
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: this product is all and more this realy sounds good and easy to play the heigth is perfect the cowbell nice sound
customer_reviews.author: jackeline gomez

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received the Drums and it had no instructions to assemble and had missing part for the Cowbell. I had emailed the seller and went back and forth but no result to getting the missing part. This was a gift and I was really disappointed that the part was missing and I could not give the gift fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Blasian

customer_reviews.title: grove percussion timbale
customer_reviews.text: This timbale is the rigth one for the person w a low buget. Good sound quality n great craftmanship.i already play in a consert and believe me my friends gave me compliment about how good they sounded.thanks guy
customer_reviews.author: andres.Garrastegui

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Not for professional percussion setup, but will suffice for us wannabe's
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY EHRIG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent seller GOD BLESS what we needed in the church greetings from Venezuela
customer_reviews.author: CHRINGER PALACIOS

customer_reviews.title: i love it! it's a Christmas gift for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it!it's a Christmas gift for my husband and i really think he is going to love it.I was actually looking in store but it was very expensive.Amazon have the best price.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For now it gets a 1 star, product does ...
customer_reviews.text: For now it gets a 1 star, product does not include instructions so I’ve been trying to figure it out can’t find videos on YouTube to help me.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Timbales for the price, I took some time to tune them and they are perfect for jam sessions. The Cow bell is surprisingly nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jalil

customer_reviews.title: Good But....
customer_reviews.text: I just gave theses to my mom as an Christmas present and she loves then. The only downside is that they didn't have instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bardell

customer_reviews.title: and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: The product is worth its values, and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba

product_meta.title: GP Percussion LT156 Timbale Drum Set
product_meta.description: The LT156, GP Percussion Timbale Drum Set features 13-inch and 14-inch drums and stand. Set includes a center-mounted cowbell and holder. The heavy-duty, double braced stand is height-adjustable and built to take it. Includes Drum sticks and tuning key.
feature_bullets: 13-inch and 14-inch drums with a center-mounted cowbell and holder
Heavy-duty, double braced stand is height-adjustable and built to take it
Includes Drum sticks and tuning key

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
